block.name: nyquist
block.doc:
Computes the Nyquist plot i.e Imaginary part versus Real part of the frequency response of the product of two transfer functions.
The inputs are the coefficients a third order transfer function.
Example: For the transfer function - (s^2+2*0.9*10*s+100)/(s^2+2*0.3*10.1*s+102.01), the numerator is of the form - 0,1,2*0.9*10,100 and the denominator is of the form - 0,1,2*0.3*10.1,102.01.
